mapper.select:
SELECT mv.id id, mv.vehicleprefix vehicleprefix, mv.vehicleno vehicleno, mv.memberid memberid, mv.vehicletype vehicletype, mv.vehicletypename vehicletypename, mv.vehiweight vehiweight, mv.vehilength vehilength, mv.status status, mv.vehilicenseimgpath vehilicenseimgpath, mv.vehiheadimgpath vehiheadimgpath, mv.createtime createtime, mv.vehiOwnerName userName, mv.vehiOwnerTel telphone, mv.desc1 desc1, mv.desc2 desc2, i.username ownername, i.telphone ownerphone, i.companyname companyname, i.companytel companytel, m.cellphone cellphone FROM wuliu_member_vehicle mv LEFT JOIN member_info i ON mv.memberid = i.id LEFT JOIN member m on mv.memberid = m.id 1=1
and (i.username like "%" #{ownername,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%" or i.companyname like "%" #{ownername,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%")
and (i.telphone like "%" #{ownerphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%" or i.companytel like "%" #{ownerphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%")
and mv.vehicleprefix like "%" #{vehicleprefix,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"
and mv.vehicleno like "%" #{vehicleno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"
and mv.vehiOwnerName like "%" #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"
and mv.vehiOwnerTel like "%" #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"
and mv.desc2 = #{desc2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and mv.status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by mv.createtime desc
limit #{limit,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT count(*) FROM wuliu_member_vehicle mv LEFT JOIN member_info i ON mv.memberid = i.id 1=1
and (i.username like "%" #{ownername,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%" or i.companyname like "%" #{ownername,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%")
and (i.telphone like "%" #{ownerphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%" or i.companytel like "%" #{ownerphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%")
and mv.vehicleprefix like "%" #{vehicleprefix,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"
and mv.vehicleno like "%" #{vehicleno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"
and mv.vehiOwnerName like "%" #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"
and mv.vehiOwnerTel like "%" #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"
and mv.status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and mv.desc2 = #{desc2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT mv.id id, mv.vehicleprefix vehicleprefix, mv.vehicleno vehicleno, mv.memberid memberid, mv.vehiOwnerName userName, mv.vehiOwnerTel telphone, mv.vehicletype vehicletype, mv.vehicletypename vehicletypename, mv.vehiweight vehiweight, mv.vehilength vehilength, mv.status status, mv.vehilicenseimgpath vehilicenseimgpath, mv.vehiheadimgpath vehiheadimgpath, mv.createtime createtime, mv.registcode registcode, mv.registimage registimage, mv.opercode opercode, mv.operimage operimage, mv.identitycode identitycode, mv.identieyimage identieyimage, mv.agreeimage agreeimage, mv.roadtransportcode roadtransportcode, mv.roadtransportimage roadtransportimage, mv.desc1 desc1, mv.desc2 desc2, mv.desc3 desc3, mv.desc4 desc4, mv.vehiwidth vehiwidth, mv.vehiheight vehiheight, mv.drivingTime drivingTime FROM wuliu_member_vehicle mv
mv.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
